entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:50 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tatlayoko Lake 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -20.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow over southern sections. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
